meanings.sent1: She surmounts her fear of heights by slowly climbing higher each day.
meanings.sent2: The hiker surmounts the steep mountain trail with determination.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel surmounts the challenge of reaching the bird feeder by cleverly jumping from the tree.
meanings.sent4: His perseverance surmounts any obstacle in his path like a skilled mountaineer conquering a peak.
meanings.sent5: The student's hard work surmounts the academic challenges, leading to success.

meanings.definition: Be on top of; be above
meanings.sent1: The flag proudly surmounts the highest point of the building.
meanings.sent2: The majestic eagle surmounts the tree, surveying the forest below.
meanings.sent3: The crown surmounts the king's head, symbolizing his authority.
meanings.sent4: The sunflower surmounts the garden, standing tall among the other flowers.
meanings.sent5: The lighthouse beacon surmounts the tower, guiding ships safely to shore.

meanings.sent1: Her kindness surmounts any material possessions in importance.
meanings.sent2: The beauty of nature surmounts any man-made creation.
meanings.sent3: His laughter surmounts the gloomy atmosphere, bringing joy to all.
meanings.sent4: The love shared between friends surmounts any disagreements that may arise.
meanings.sent5: The wisdom of experience surmounts the ignorance of youth.
